name: Force Bubble

valDecimal.description: Round x-axis value up to N decimal places

sizeDecimal.description: Round size value up to N decimal places

colorDecimal.description: Round color value up to N decimal places

sizeLabel.description: Name of measure for bubble size

colorLabel.description: Name of measure for bubble color

startColor.description: Color of the bubble with lowest color value

endColor.description: Color of the bubble with highest color value

setStartColor.description: Sets the color of the bubble with lowest value.

parameters.name: newColor
parameters.description: Color of the bubble with lowest value

setEndColor.description: Sets the color of the bubble with highest value.

parameters.name: newColor
parameters.description: Color of the bubble with highest value

setTitle.description: Sets the title of the chart.

setData.description: Sets the data of the chart.

getSelectedLabel.description: Returns the label of selected bubble.

getSelectedXValue.description: Returns the x-axis value of selected bubble.

getSelectedSizeValue.description: Returns the size-axis value of selected bubble.

getSelectedColorValue.description: Returns the color-axis value of selected bubble.

setXAxisLabel.description: Sets the label of measure plotted on x-axis of the chart.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: The new name of measure on x-axis

setSizeAxisLabel.description: Sets the label of measure represented by bubble size.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: The new name of measure for bubble size

setColorAxisLabel.description: Sets the label of measure represented by bubble color.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: The new name of measure for bubble color

setValueDecimal.description: Sets the decimal places for measure on x-axis.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: Decimal places of measure on x-axis

setSizeValueDecimal.description: Sets the decimal places for measure represented by bubble size.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: Decimal places of measure for bubble size

setColorValueDecimal.description: Sets the decimal places for measure represented by bubble color.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: Decimal places of measure for bubble color

onSelect.description: Called when the user selects/de-selects a bubble.
